description: This file defines a custom formatter class 'SafeFormatter' that extends Python's string.Formatter to handle missing keys and invalid format specifications gracefully.

classes.name: SafeFormatter
classes.description: A subclass of string.Formatter that provides custom handling for missing keys and invalid format specifiers.

methods.name: get_value
methods.description: Overrides the get_value method to return the key as a string if it is missing in kwargs.

methods.name: format_field
methods.description: Overrides the format_field method to catch ValueError exceptions and return the placeholder as a literal string.
